title:
Why didn\'t the city of Wilmington respond to Google\'s highly-publicized Request for Information which could have brought an ultra high-speed broadband network to the city?



It seems an obvious missed opportunity considering the city\'s stated desire to lure business and convention traffic to Wilmington. 



http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2010/03/next-steps-for-our-experimental-fiber.html
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6333
